text: John Wick is a series of neo-noir action movies and media franchise. It stars Keanu Reeves as the titular character who becomes a vigilante trying to get revenge against the criminal who killed his pet dog. The series started with the release of John Wick in 2014, followed by Chapter 2 in 2017, Chapter 3 â€“ Parabellum in 2019 and Chapter 4 in 2023. There are spin-offs planned for the franchise. The limited series The Continental: From the World of John Wick debuted in 2023, while From the World of John Wick: Ballerina is set to be released in 2025. Category:Action movies
title: John Wick
